script_description: This script trains a Faster R-CNN object detection model using the PyTorch library and the COCO dataset. It utilizes the specified software and resource requirements for optimal performance.
other_details: The script runs a Python script (`tools/train.py`) with the specified configuration file (`configs/faster_rcnn/faster_rcnn_r50_fpn_1x_coco.py`) and saves the output to a directory called `./work1`.
